overview: This documentary offers a window onto the life and work of the iconic artist, Huguette Caland. Caland had an epiphany, leaving everything behind and moving to Paris to pursue her career as an artist. With a bold and experimental spirit, she pushed the formal boundaries of art to reflect a feminist impulse. A prodigious artist, she became recognized for drawings, paintings, and sculptures that embody a joyful, exuberant, and erotic sensibility.
title: Huguette Caland: Outside the Lines
